sourcesContent:
<template>
<n-grid  cols="2 s:1 m:2 l:2 xl:2 2xl:2" responsive="screen">
  <n-grid-item>
    <div class="green"/>  
  </n-grid-item>
  <n-grid-item>
    <div class="light-green"/>
  </n-grid-item>
</n-grid>


<n-layout>
  <n-layout-header>
  步步为营
  </n-layout-header>
  
  <n-layout has-sider>
    <n-layout-content content-style="padding:24px">

      <n-card :bordered="false" title="营销活动" v-if="userInfo.created_campaigns">
        <n-card v-for="cam in userInfo.created_campaigns" :key="cam.id || cam" embedded>
         dddd {{cam}}
        </n-card>
      </n-card>

    
    </n-layout-content>
    <n-layout-sider :width="800">
      <n-card title="营销日历" :bordered="false">
        <n-calendar v-model:value="value" #="{ year, month, date }" :is-date-disabled="isDateDisabled" @update:value="handleUpdateValue">
        {{ year }}-{{ month }}-{{ date }}
        </n-calendar>
      </n-card>

    </n-layout-sider>
  </n-layout>
  <n-layout-footer>footer</n-layout-footer>
</n-layout>
</template>

<script setup>
import { isYesterday, addDays } from 'date-fns/esm';
import {NGrid, NGridItem,NLayout, NLayoutSider,NLayoutContent,NLayoutHeader,NLayoutFooter, NCalendar,NCard} from 'naive-ui';
import {ref} from 'vue';
import axios from 'axios';

import {onBeforeMount} from 'vue';
const userName = ref('');
const userInfo = ref({
    username:'',
    created_brands:'',
    created_campaigns:'',
    created_products:'',
    });
//const message = useMessage();
const value = ref(addDays(Date.now(), 1).valueOf());
const handleUpdateValue = (_, { year, month, date }) => {  
  console.log(`${year}-${month}-${date}`);
};

const isDateDisabled = (timestamp) => {
    if (isYesterday(timestamp)) {
          return true
        }
    return false
    };

const fetchUserInfo = async() => {
      const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
      console.log(token);
      try {
        const resp =  await axios.get('/account/auth/',{
            headers: {
                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` // 设置请求头
                }});
        console.log('验证结果:')
        console.log(resp.data);
        userInfo.value = resp.data;
        userName.value = resp.data.username;
        //has_brands.value = resp.data.created_brands.length;
        localStorage.setItem('username',resp.data.username);
          } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch user info:', error);
      }
    };

onBeforeMount(()=>{
    fetchUserInfo();})

</script>

<style>
.green{
   height: 108px;
  background-color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 0.24);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
    }
.light-green {
  height: 108px;
  background-color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 0.12);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}
</style>
